test.name: User Able To Login With Correct Credential

kw.name: Open Android Apps
kw.doc: Fill in udid and deviceName parameter in data.robot with your udid

kw.name: Open Application
kw.doc: Opens a new application to given Appium server. Capabilities of appium server, Android and iOS, Please check https://github.com/appium/appium/blob/master/docs/en/writing-running-appium/server-args.md | *Option* | *Man.* | *Description* | | remote_url | Yes | Appium server url | | alias | no | alias | | strict_ssl | No | allows you to send commands to an invalid certificate host like a self-signed one. |

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Element
kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains `locator` element.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Element
kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains `locator` element.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click element identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` appears on current page.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given `text` into text field identified by `locator`.
kw.msg: Typing text 'New User' into text field 'id=com.loginmodule.learning:id/textInputEditTextName'

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given `text` into text field identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given `text` into text field identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given `text` into text field identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click element identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Press Keycode
kw.doc: Sends a press of keycode to the device.

kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains `locator` element.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Element
kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains `locator` element.

kw.name: Element Should Contain Text
kw.doc: Verifies element identified by ``locator`` contains text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element '//android.widget.TextView[@index='0']' contains text 'Android NewLine Learning'.

kw.name: Element Should Contain Text
kw.doc: Verifies element identified by ``locator`` contains text ``expected``.

kw.name: Press Keycode
kw.doc: Sends a press of keycode to the device.
